website_summaries.verdict: This no-frills sandwich cutter set is ideal for those who only need a few different shapes without all the extras.
pros: Very affordable, with a good variety of shapes to entice both boys and girls to finish their lunches
cons: Large size may not work well with smaller slices

customer_reviews.title: Makes sandwiches fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has 2 children, ages 3 and 4. She bought a set of these shaped cutters about 4 months ago and they have been a real hit. She makes sandwiches for her kids (2 standard slices of bread plus meat, cheese and lettuce) then uses the cutters. The Dinosaur shape is the one they like the best. That being said, I ordered a set recently for my household to be able to make fun food when my grandkids come over. I tried them myself to cut my sandwich the other day, used the heart shaped cutter and it worked very well. Them seem adequately sturdy, sharp enough to push down through a sandwich, and they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: LeonaBelle

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: These come in handy for my daughters school lunches, however I wish they were a little more fit to the bread. They often are little bigger than the bread so some of the edges are mixed in the crust and it doesn't look as "clean" as i've seen other sandwich cutters, but they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Can't cut through sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I like the different shapes; however, we had a hard time cutting it and maintaining the shape. We didn't use it on very thick sandwiches either, just two prices of breads with a slice of cheese in the middle. Maybe we just need to cut each layer individually. I wish it would have cut better. I was planning to use it for a party tray but decided against it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Girl

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these cutters
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these cutters. My son is a picky eater so he gets to choose which shape he wants each day for his sandwich. They are a great size as only the crust is removed and about 98% of the sandwich is left. When you have a little one who doesn't eat much to begin with reducing the amount cutoff is awesome. I know he will eat the entire sandwich and all I threw out was the crust.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Making sandwiches FUN again!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! They use the entire sandwich and make the sandwich "fun" again! My kindergarten son was tired of taking sandwiches to school but as soon as they were cut into a shape, they were delicious again. The actual cutters are a great quality, as long as we are good to them I know they are going to last quite a few years. They are strong feeling and they are very easy to hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Marriah

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: These work great. The edges are crisp so they make a clean cut. We have used them on pb & j, cheese sandwich and turkey sandwiches. So much better prices than in the local stores. The dolphin is my least favorite only because it has small nose and tail you have to be gentle with to remove from the cutter (I'm not gentle). It still works though. Super happy with this purchase. Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsye L. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Sandwich Perfection
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old is obsessed with having her lunch sandwiches cut into shapes. I tried cutting them by hand with a knife and that didn't work, so I found these and they are life savers! She LOVES the dolphins and heart one the most! These are the perfect size for standard lunch bread as well. I bought some others that were way too small and these are the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. My son loves cutting out his own ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. My son loves cutting out his own sandwiches, although he needs a bit of help from me, as he is only 4 and doesn't have the strength quite yet. The colors are bright and they are well made, although I wish they were a slight bit smaller. The bread we buy is not like to normal white bread size and therefore most of those shapes do not cut a perfectly sized sandwich, but sandwiches with missing parts which can lead to toddler tears.
customer_reviews.author: Nahima

customer_reviews.title: Great but doesn't get all the crust
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the shapes. Our current bread (Oroweat Multi grain) is too short so there is a lot of crust in the shapes. Great for pb&j's and grilled cheese but not sure if they will cut thru anything else. Shapes come out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: These work great, your child will love their sandwich again!
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year old son suddenly stopped eating his sandwiches - he would eat a few bites and say he's done. I always cut the crust off since he did not like it. When I saw these on Amazon, I thought this would be the perfect solution, and it was!! He gets so excited to see which shape his sandwich will be in, and usually requests the train. He is now eating his ENTIRE sandwich again. These cut the crust off perfectly and do not waste any of the actual sandwich part. They are easy to use, sturdy, and even cut the sandwich in half. I highly recommend these, especially for those picky eaters!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my sons lunch sandwiches for school he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I actually only bought this set for the dinosaur cutter. But all of them are great quality. My daughter loves dinosaurs, so she loves it when I use the dinosaur cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Michael Ross

customer_reviews.title: Works but wish the defining cut was a little better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old in order to get him excited for camp and bringing lunch. I have only used the dinosaur cutter so far. It's not bad. I used it on wheat bread and thought the cut might be a little more concise. I had to tear the bread on the outside to try to get it shaped nicely. For an inexpensive cutter this does the job, you just will need to carefully cut the outer edges so your child could recognize the pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Segura

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these! I have told several other people to buy these as well. They use the entire piece of bread and make sandwiches so much easier to feed to small children. These are such a great idea and they are dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Sandwich cutters
customer_reviews.text: I got these so I could surprise my kindergartner every day with a different shaped sandwich. These make cutting crust off so much easier, and also fit perfectly on the bread so that the crust is really the only part getting thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn B

customer_reviews.title: My preschooler loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I ordered a different brand and they were too big for the bread but these are perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Patti D

customer_reviews.title: A Great Way To Dress Up A Sandwich
customer_reviews.text: These are a big hit with the kids. On those days when a sandwich is what they get in the lunchbox, the shapes are a big hit. I swear, my kids are more concerned with the cool shape than they are with what they're eating!
customer_reviews.author: Candace ~ Book Addict Haven

customer_reviews.title: Cool shapes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. My son looks forward eating his lunch everyday because of this magnificent product.
customer_reviews.author: Gee4gemme

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for cookies?
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller than I expected. They waste a lot of sandwich bread. I have already put them in the playdough box. Maybe I will make cookies with them. Kids are happy to have them for play dough.
customer_reviews.author: Living Libros

customer_reviews.title: Too big for the bread
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about ordering these, b/c I wanted to make my kids' lunches more fun. I haven't been able to really use them much though, b/c they're bigger than the sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: Kristaleighbird

customer_reviews.title: makes sandwiches more interesting
customer_reviews.text: My young grandson is going through a picky stage, and these have added a little interest to sandwiches. They work very well. And with 5 in the set, we can have some at both houses!
customer_reviews.author: She loves a deal

customer_reviews.title: Fun fantastic love this
customer_reviews.text: Fun fantastic love this! They cut well and fit the bread slice perfect. Not to much of the cut away to toss out. The dinosaur is the favorite in my house!
customer_reviews.author: C. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but not too sharp for kids to use
customer_reviews.text: Great quality & fun shapes! My girls love these! I bought them hoping they would eat sandwiches better & it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Emma E

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! Every time I make them a sandwich they each get to pick out the shapes they want and they eat more because their food is fun :0) really helps with my 5 year old picky eater!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Makes lunches fun!
customer_reviews.text: Making lunches a hit every single day!🙌 easy to use and then I drop them in the dishwasher. I love having a set to switch it up for school lunch box s
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: These work great for sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: These work great for sandwiches. My grandchildren love the sandwiches when I use these cutters. I would recommend this seller. My shipment was delivered promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Fee Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves having his sandwiches cut into shapes. Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Belshan

customer_reviews.title: Heart and Star
customer_reviews.text: Heart and Star shapes seemed to work best- fit the bread well, shape maintained its resemblance. I am able to cut through several slices of deli meat and cheese and do not need to use a knife after. I do not use the other shapes. I recommend purchasing a single sandwich cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and came in a nice box. Shipment was quick too!
customer_reviews.author: red olives

customer_reviews.title: these are cute but way to big.
customer_reviews.text: these are cute but way to big. not sure what bread size these were made for but i've found it hard to find the appropriate kind
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: They work really well. I think meat sandwiches come out better than peanut butter n jelly though.
customer_reviews.author: Mkstone

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and so easy to use! My son loves it when I make sandwiches for his lunch. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: They are fun and my daughter loves picking out a shape - ...
customer_reviews.text: They are fun and my daughter loves picking out a shape - they don't cut through the bread the greatest as they are just plastic- but they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Renja DeGroff

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandwich cutters. Cute sandwiches are better than plain ole boring ones any day if you ask my 3 year old. They are also more durable than an average cookie cutter, and utilize more of the whole sandwhich.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kasten

customer_reviews.title: Your kids will love it
customer_reviews.text: fits very well with standard bread leaving little waste - usually only the crusts come off and then your kids have a fun sandwich!
customer_reviews.author: L_Mil

customer_reviews.title: Sandwich shapes great for little helpers
customer_reviews.text: The kids love helping make their sandwiches. Very cute shapes and easy for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: B. SMITH

customer_reviews.title: I bought these as a gift for a 3 year ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a 3 year old that started day care. He loves them and is able to make his sandwich with moms help
customer_reviews.author: Marcela G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it would have been great if it was slightly smaller... the cutter is bigger than the sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: agl0522

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived fast and was just as described. I can't wait to use in for my son's lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Hate them, huge waste of bread and hard to use
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are so darling! My very picky eater started ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so darling! My very picky eater started eating her sandwiches cut out from these shapes.And she didn't eat any before.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Well made but some of them are larger than my bread, ha! So that sucks but my kid loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Axsom

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They're sharp enough to cut through lunchmeat
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They're sharp enough to cut through lunchmeat, cheese, and the bread. The only issue is I sometimes buy bread that is just a bit smaller than some of the cutters. The hearts, dinosaurs, and trains are on the bigger side. I use my hands to flatten out the bread and it still comes out fine. Not having to do that would give this product five stars.
customer_reviews.author: md11888

customer_reviews.title: Nice rigid plastic
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through all sandwiches thus far. Nice rigid plastic . Easy to use and easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and good quality. They work best with a full size piece of bread.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Cute lunch product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for packing my 4 year old's lunches. It's hard to fit some of them on the bread I buy, but that's not their fault. It's fun for me to make, and my daughter to eat sandwiches with these shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cut through the sandwiches great and the kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does not cut between the crust. I wish it was a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I like the pieces that showed up
customer_reviews.text: I like the pieces that showed up, but I got a box that said "five piece" as advertised, but there are only four pieces (I am missing the star) and I can tell the box has been opened.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Try are flimsy and do not cut sandwiches. Don't bother
customer_reviews.author: Rbjoe94

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids' lunches. My kids and I both love the shapes. My only complaint is they aren't sharp enough to cut through a sandwich. I have to go back over the imprint with a knife to get them in the desired shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my toddler loves making her own sandwich and encourages her to eat because of the shapes
customer_reviews.author: Jemapelle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem to be sharp enough to cut the bread without squishing the shapes.
customer_reviews.author: JustBCuz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. But I gave 4 star because they melt in dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: VnessaR

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These don't cut bread and was very misleading. My daughter asked that I never use them again...
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Sipe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable shapes for little ones.Easy to use and cut through standard sandwich bread very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of shapes! My son loves having cute sandwich shapes for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these cutters
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these cutters! On a loaf of sandwich bread the only really waste is the crust which is awesome and my kids really love their sandwiches being in fun shapes and they now gobble them right up!!
customer_reviews.author: L Walters

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves the shapes I can cut her sandwiches ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the shapes I can cut her sandwiches into but they sent me two dinosaur cutters and left out the dolphin cutter, which was a reason I chose this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Collins

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what I was looking for and my ...
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for and my kids are loving their new shaped sandwiches they get for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Celena Patten

customer_reviews.title: Not what’s listed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the train cutout and received two dolphins and no train!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hull

customer_reviews.title: Big hit for my toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for pb&j's! Make sure to use thin white bread and they work well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Same as my last review. They are enjoying making lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Pawlik

customer_reviews.title: My son loved dinosaur sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: My son loved dinosaur sandwiches. This is light, easy to cut and fit to the size of sandwich bread.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Messy cut....
customer_reviews.text: These are not sharp enough to cut neatly through a prepared sandwhich.
customer_reviews.author: A. Case

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the fun shapes
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are great i have only used them to cut sandiwiches amd they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kid doesn't like crust so this is the best option to take off crust and shaped sandwiches are little inviting , so he likes it. The cutters are pretty large making it hard to find bread big enough to make the shapes nicely.The crust goes for birds My son only eats a half of a sandwich so i usually just try and get one good cut for him and save the mangled mess of the other half for birds. These are amazing! They take care of the crust for my picky eater. Only concern is made in China and not BPA free, so over a long period how it will be safe to cut
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: My kids love their crust taken off and their shaped sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: My kids love their crust taken off and their shaped sandwiches. We had two dinosaur sandwich cutters and one of them broke because we had them forever. These cutters feel a bit harder than the first ones we had. They aren't heavy, just seem to be made of a more durable hard plastic. These particular cutters seal the sandwiches well without having to press on the middle extremely hard. In the last past, with the old ones the sandwiches didn't always completely seal the first time I pressed them down. These do and they cut the center.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen119

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love getting their toast and sandwiches in fun shapes. They are easy to use by both kids and adults, and wash easily either in the sink or in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Every sandwich ha been eaten since the purchase of these!!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos love these!! Cuts off the crust most every time. It really depends on how big your bread is. You'll know after the first few times. I also make the sandwich and then move it on to a cutting board and you have to press REALLY hard and then move from side to side to really cut through bread, especially fresh bread. They still come out awesome and some leave a tiny bit of crust behind. Ever since I've purchased these, EVERY sandwich has been eaten in its entirety! Mommy win!!! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Yay for fancy sandwiches!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! My daughter is definitely showing off all of the cool shapes her dad makes with her Jelly Sandwich. I wish I could say peanut butter and jelly but some kid is gonna puff up like a balloon if it comes in contact with the pure deliciousness that is peanut butter...back to the review, these make precise cuts when pressed down without smashing the bread. There is also very little waste. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BSnyde

customer_reviews.title: My star sandwich didn't look like a star because the points of the star were ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm afraid I have to agree with the reviewers that found the cutters don't quite fit a standard slice of bread, they are just a little too large. My star sandwich didn't look like a star because the points of the star were off the bread. I haven't tried any other shapes yet. I'll continue to try it and will try them on other kinds of bread and will update this review if I have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my picky eater interested.
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves his sandwiches in the car and train shape. He's and extremely picky 4 year old and I need to pack his lunch everyday for daycare and this convinced him to eat sandwiches, which is a huge deal when you're in a family of 4 with two full time working parents. I make him a sandwich about once a week and I ask him which shape he wants and it keeps him interested. I haven't used the star shaped one yet, I feel like it would waste too much of the sandwich and he wouldn't be full but the other ones are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Deely

customer_reviews.title: These work pretty well but I wish I had bought single shaped ...
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well but I wish I had bought single shaped cutters instead of these that cut each sandwich into multiple shapes. With these you end up squashing the sandwich a lot before you get it to really cut all the way through due to the cutting edges that run through the middle of the design. If it was just a perimeter design with nothing through the middle it wouldn't squash it quite so much. They are still fun though.
customer_reviews.author: Gisack

customer_reviews.title: These are cute and they de-crust the bread while making ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and they de-crust the bread while making the shapes. It does take some wiggling to get it all the way through the bread, but I have been using bento boxes and these make the perfect-sized sandwich sections for the little holes so the extra work is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toddler Kitchen Accessories
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! They take care of the crust for my picky eater, and she loves guessing the shapes! These fit the best on the smaller loaves of bread, but that's what we usually buy anyway since I prefer the smaller serving sizes. We've even used these for cutting cookies. They are great, pretty easy to wash, and super cute
customer_reviews.author: KaseyChandra

customer_reviews.title: I like that these are plastic and I don't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the trains and the dolphins the most, especially when I make grilled cheese for my toddler. I like that these are plastic and I don't have to be afraid of my son cutting himself, at least not as badly as the metal ones, or having them rust. It does double duty as a toy (with supervision, of course).
customer_reviews.author: CTran

customer_reviews.title: My children and I both love these sandwich cutters
customer_reviews.text: My children and I both love these sandwich cutters. They love being able to pick out a shape and help cut their sandwiches, cheese and pancakes. It makes eating fun for my picky eater. The plastic is thick and feels well made. Some reviews mentioned that they are not sharp enough to cut all the way through but that is actually a feature I like because I don't have to worry about my children fingers getting cut. I just pick up the sandwich and push on the opposite side of the cutter so it cuts all the way through the bread if that makes sense. I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: My son now loves his sandwiches!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old son typically only eats half of his sandwich (1 slice of bread) with a lot of prompting and/or rewards. However, once he saw his sandwich was a train, he ate the whole sandwich (2 slices) without any complaints! This definitely makes his school lunches more interesting and the cutters cut well on thin slices of bread. The shapes are made of plastic and are not sharp enough to cut my hands. These are so easy to use! I’m so glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: Pearlyxc

customer_reviews.title: My three year old loves when I use these to ...
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves when I use these to make his sandwiches. The only drawback is they are rather big and don't work with a lot of the bread we buy. But, if they get my son to eat his sandwiches, I am on board! :)
customer_reviews.author: ChiMom

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun! I really love how they waste minimal bread. The value is excellent too! I was going to buy just the train for my son's party but found that for just about the same price I could have this whole set.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Schurger

customer_reviews.title: sturdy product!
customer_reviews.text: My son was very excited to have his sandwiches in shapes everyday at school! He is now excited to eat his lunch:) Strong, sturdy product!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: We love these! My kid likes seeing what shape he got in his lunch that day and they're easy to clean in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Erin N. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Easy to cut the sandwich and come out perfect!

customer_reviews.text: Theses are very sturdy and easy to use. I like that they are a thick plastic that will not break while using and they are dishwasher safe.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these for my grandkids to make eating more fun. Got all 5 and they are as cute ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my grandkids to make eating more fun. Got all 5 and they are as cute as what is shown. My grandson loves to help when designing his sandwich.

customer_reviews.text: These are ok. They don't cut through the bread great so you do have to work it a little but once you get the clean cut the shapes are clean.

customer_reviews.title: Fun designs that work well with soft fillings
customer_reviews.text: Fun designs that work well with soft fillings, like peanut butter and jelly. Adds a touch of whimsy to my kid's lunch, which he enjoys.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute, work great, and there is not a lot of sandwich waste!

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Change a Routine Lunch into Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with children, especially picky eaters, are bound to enjoy these! I wish the sandwich cutters were around when my children were little.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT waste your money! Don't work

customer_reviews.text: These are so fun and easy to use! My son (5yo) has eaten a full sandwich with it being cut into fund designs.

customer_reviews.title: Good size, solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They're just the right size. And they are even cuter in person than online, so I was pleasantly surprised. The quality is good--they're plastic, but solid and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My kids get so excited to have their sandwiches cut into fun shapes!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton H

customer_reviews.title: Good value, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, makes lunch time and breakfast a little fun with these cut outs. Good value for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: ichiban3

customer_reviews.title: Fun set.
customer_reviews.text: This set worked perfectly for our recent preschooler birthday party. The cutters fit nicely on a standard square loaf of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Archippus

customer_reviews.title: Too big for our bread
customer_reviews.text: Cuts well, but too big for the sandwich bread we use (old-school square shape, not the bigger oval-ish shaped bread).
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: These were great it was only a couple dollars more for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed the train cutters for sandwiches. These were great it was only a couple dollars more for the other shapes so thought my kids would like them, and they do!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
